articles.title: Students have been called to the office for AI surveillance false alarms
articles.summary: Educators say the artificial intelligence, technology has saved lives. But it also brings risk that a thoughtless statement could upend a child’s life.

articles.title: Apple Stock Rallies on AI Hopes, Tariff Relief After Trump Deal
articles.summary: Apple Inc.’s two-day surge has it on the cusp of ending a prolonged run under a key technical threshold that’s been symbolic of its struggle to convince investors that it can deliver on artificial intelligence and manage its tariff risks.
articles.translated_title: Apple Stock Rallies on AI Hopes, Tariff Relief After Trump Deal

articles.title: Duolingo (DUOL) Q2 earnings 2025
articles.summary: Duolingo shares skyrocketed after the language learning platform boosted its guidance due to strong user growth driven by artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_summary: Duolingo shares skyrocketed after the language learning platform boosted its guidance due to strong user growth driven by artificial intelligence.

articles.title: James Cameron Shares 'Terminator'-Style Vision for A.I.
articles.summary: Addressing the growing fears surrounding artificial intelligence, James Cameron shared some stark views about humanity's relationship with A.I.
articles.translated_title: James Cameron Shares 'Terminator'-Style Vision for A.I.

articles.title: Japan tech giant SoftBank Group sees better fortunes on surging AI stocks
articles.summary: Japanese technology conglomerate SoftBank Group has reported a $2.9 billion profit for the April-June quarter, rebounding from a loss a year earlier, as its investments benefited from the craze for artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Roblox rolls out open-source AI system to protect kids from predators in chats
articles.summary: Roblox, the online gaming platform wildly popular with children and teenagers, is rolling out an open-source version of an artificial intelligence system it says can help preemptively detect predatory language in game chats.
articles.translated_title: Roblox rolls out open-source AI system to protect kids from predators in chats
articles.translated_summary: Roblox, the online gaming platform wildly popular with children and teenagers, is rolling out an open-source version of an artificial intelligence system it says can help preemptively detect predatory language in game chats.

articles.title: Scientists want to prevent AI from going rogue by teaching it to be bad first
articles.summary: Researchers are trying to “vaccinate” artificial intelligence systems against developing evil, overly flattering or otherwise harmful personality traits in a seemingly counterintuitive way: by giving them a small dose of those problematic traits.
articles.translated_title: Scientists want to prevent AI from going rogue by teaching it to be bad first
articles.translated_summary: Researchers are trying to “vaccinate” artificial intelligence systems against developing evil, overly flattering or otherwise harmful personality traits in a seemingly counterintuitive way: by giving them a small dose of those problematic traits.

articles.title: SoftBank Concedes Stargate Project With OpenAI Needs More Time
articles.summary: SoftBank Group Corp. said it’s taking longer than anticipated to get Stargate off the ground, conceding for the first time that the $500 billion artificial intelligence tie-up in the US with OpenAI is bogging down.
articles.translated_title: SoftBank Concedes Stargate Project With OpenAI Needs More Time
